SpaceBar: At blazing speeds throughout the universe you shall compete against other humans over who has the fastest fingers!
Typing Game: Typing is the modern version of a sword. Typing will ensure the survival of humanity in the coming age of intergalactic space colonialism. Typing is an old art form passed down throughout the ages. But this time it's different. This time much is at stake. Everything is at stake. Compete with beings and may the smartest win because the winner will receive a chicken dinner!
Village: Lead the people of your village through hardship and glory throughout the ages! In this epic quest you will conquer or be conquered!
